description: Returns the custom email verification template for the template name you specify. For more information about custom verification email templates, see Using Custom Verification Email Templates in the Amazon SES Developer Guide. You can execute this operation no more than once per second.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the custom verification email template to retrieve.

nested_items.name: TemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom verification email template.

nested_items.name: FromEmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address that the custom verification email is sent from.

nested_items.name: TemplateSubject
nested_items.description: The subject line of the custom verification email.

nested_items.name: TemplateContent
nested_items.description: The content of the custom verification email.

nested_items.name: SuccessRedirectionURL
nested_items.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is successfully verified.

nested_items.name: FailureRedirectionURL
nested_items.description: The URL that the recipient of the verification email is sent to if his or her address is not successfully verified.
